title: Nepal's Janakpur Prepares For 'Sita Ram Vivah Mahotsav' Amid Tight Security

title: Depleted By War, Ukraine Gives Absconding Soldiers Second Chance
content: As Ukraine's military struggles to find enough troops, particularly infantry, to hold off Russia's much larger army, some units are giving a second chance to those who have absconded from service.
summary: As Ukraine's military struggles to find enough troops, particularly infantry, to hold off Russia's much larger army, some units are giving a second chance to those who have absconded from service.

title: Shocking Video Captures Indian-American Family Facing Racist Attack

title: Croatia Parents Arrested Over Fatal Neglect Of Two Toddlers
content: Croatian police arrested on Tuesday a couple suspected of fatal neglect and abuse of their two toddlers whose bodies were found buried next to their house, a minister said.

title: Thousands Of US Government Employees Get WFH Deal Ahead Of Trump

title: McDonald's E. Coli Outbreak Related To Fresh Onions Is Over
content: An E. coli outbreak that ensnared McDonald's Corp. is over, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Tuesday.

title: South Korea's Whirlwind Stint In Martial Law Jolts Markets
content: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol's surprise decision to impose martial law in South Korea for the first time in more than 40 years - and then just as swiftly reverse course - sparked whiplash in the country's foreign-traded assets.
summary: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol's surprise decision to impose martial law in South Korea for the first time in more than 40 years - and then just as swiftly reverse course - sparked whiplash in the country's foreign-traded assets.

title: Video: Asteroid Burns Like "Fireball" After Entering Atmosphere Above Russia
content: A speedy descent of a small asteroid lit up the sky in Russia's remote far eastern region of Yakutia early on Wednesday, as it burned out after entering the Earth's atmosphere.

title: After Trump Win, LinkedIn Co-Founder Considering Leaving US: Report

title: Donald Trump Cites Hunter Biden Pardon In Seeking Hush Money Case Dismissal
